_header: Man that was in worship took no heed
_description: A couplet in a Latin sermon Hec est voluntas dei, sanctificacio vestra

CULIi38.Transcription:
Man þat was in wurchip tok no hedeand þerfore last his
                    worshup for is mysde[de]
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 11.
